meanings.definition: A very successful and popular song, movie, or other form of entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The new animated film is expected to be one of the megahits of the year.
meanings.sent2: The band's latest album produced several megahits that topped the charts.
meanings.sent3: Everyone at the party danced to the megahits playing on the stereo.
meanings.sent4: The megahits of the 80s still resonate with audiences today.
meanings.sent5: The concert was a blast with all the megahits performed live.

meanings.definition: A very successful and popular product or service.
meanings.sent1: The tech company's latest smartphone became a megahit among consumers.
meanings.sent2: The fast-food chain's new burger was a megahit, selling out within hours.
meanings.sent3: The megahit cleaning product made household chores a breeze.
meanings.sent4: The fashion brand's new line of shoes became the megahits of the season.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant's signature dish was a megahit with customers.
